TopicTitle: Devnote Tuesdays: The Xmas Eve Edition

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/0ff9377afa68dc3ad3fe6844aaf1bd38/tumblr_inline_myaz5pAmI01rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/83d49a59bbfd78b5cd805f5595e51cd8/tumblr_inline_myazc7vaST1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>Season’s greetings, everyone. There will be no devnotes happening until we’re all back in the new year. Until then, please allow some time to reflect upon what the season means to you - or if not, here’s a picture of a fiery reindeer liftoff, brought to you by forum poster, <strong>Tw1</strong>.</p>

<p>In fact, check out the entire forum <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60350-Jebmas-Christmas-Tree-other-holiday-decorations-megathread"><strong>holiday megathread</strong></a>. With all the Kerbal holiday spirit and ingenuity floating around in there, good ‘ol Saint Nick, himself, could learn a thing or two.</p>
I tried making a sleigh with sepratron powered reindeer. Failed miserably.

Oh wow, something of mine got featured!. This is an honour Awesome.

Tell you what, I've just added the craft file to my dropbox, so if you've got KAS and Kerbal Engineer, You could try taking it for a flight.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/56p4bn9i0pxsrzu/Santa%20sleigh.craft

Merry Christmas Everyone!

God bless.

Edited December 25, 2013 by Tw1
I'm just proud I got my thread featured!

Nevermind carry on.

Edited December 31, 2013 by RocketTurtle

Well, this isn't exactly your thread...

Did you even care to read the OP? holiday megathread

Did you even care to read the OP? holiday megathread

Oh, wow, my apologies, I just went all out stupid.
